steps.name: Siemplify_Get Case Details
steps.description: This action will get all the data from a case and return a JSON result.  The result includes comments, entity information, insights, playbooks that ran, alert information and events.

steps.name: Siemplify_Get Case Alerts
steps.description: Use the "Get Case Alerts" action to retrieve alerts related to the case.

parameters.name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
parameters.value: {"Case ID":"1","Alert ID":"","Fields to Return":"","Nested Keys Delimiter":"."}

steps.name: Siemplify_Get Similar Cases
steps.description: Search for similar cases and return their Ids

parameters.name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
parameters.value: {"Rule Generator":true,"Port":true,"Category Outcome":true,"Entity Identifier":true,"Days Back":"2","Include Open Cases":true,"Include Closed Cases":true}
